::KitKat:;

She looked at Phobia. "Oh please don't call me leader. Crew Leader, 
OK, But not just leader." She took the plans and looked them over.
She looked up at Phobia.  "Thank you, if this plan is successful, we 
will take you back with us to Cybertron if you wish.  I'm not looking 
for a council seat, just looking out for my team."  She looked at 
Drillbit,"Tell Time Bomb, Land Mine and the others to join me in my 
quarters.  Terrorsaur too.  But not Megatron.  I want this to be a 
suprize for him.  When we have devised a perfect plan, then megatron 
will learn of this, but not before." 

She smiled and nodded to Phobia. "Yes, I shall be by your ship in a 
day or two.  I will need some of those weapons of yours to make this 
work."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia winced at the kindness KitKat was showing, she was showing 
yo 
> much gratitude where a leader should merely show adaquacy (I think 
> thats the right term)
> 
> "Of course leader, here you are." he extended his hand and offered 
> the holocube to KitKat. "Now if you'll excuse me I have some 
business 
> to attend to on my ship. If you'd like to stop out later, I'll be 
> glad to supply a manifest of my cargo." Phobia steps back carefully 
> trying not to undermind his new superior. he awaits her approval 
> before exiting.
>
